title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, February 4, 2021
description: This day marks the birth 100 years ago, and death 15 years ago, of  Betty Friedan, women’s rights activist and author of “The Feminine Mystique.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: This day marks the birth 100 years ago, and death 15 years ago, of  Betty Friedan, women’s rights activist and author of “The Feminine Mystique.”
itunes:summary: This day marks the birth 100 years ago, and death 15 years ago, of  Betty Friedan, women’s rights activist and author of “The Feminine Mystique.”
